entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He is motioning to Ron and Hermione to follow him up the platform.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who has to go to the prefect carriage first and then patrol the corridors.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another friend of Harry's who has to go to the prefect carriage first and then patrol the corridors.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is a family member of Harry's who works at the Ministry and is the right person for Harry to tell about his plan.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is another family member of Harry's who reminds him that he has only a few minutes to go before the train leaves.
